channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Huawei Targets Garmin Fans With Eliud Kipchoge Running Watch
item.description: Huawei has talked about aspirations for its next-generation running watch, which is being made in partnership with Eliud Kipchoge's dsm-firmenich runn...

item.title: At Davos, CEOs said AI isn’t coming for jobs as fast as Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei thinks
item.description: The Anthropic CEO warns 50% of entry-level white collar jobs will be gone in five years. Other tech CEOs see that as unlikely.

item.title: For UnitedHealth’s Optum, It’s ‘Back To Basics’ With Smaller Footprint
item.description: UnitedHealth Group’s Optum health services business is working on a turnaround that includes leaving markets and ending contracts with providers that ...

item.title: Heating bills expected to spike for American households nationwide this winter
item.description: Winter heating bills climb to $995 average as utility rate hikes hit low-income families hardest, as an NEADA report finds one in six households alrea...

item.title: Richard Dormer Is Returning To ‘Blue Lights’ Season 4
item.description: Somehow, Richard Dormer returned to Blue Lights.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra Price Rise: Why You Should Wait
item.description: With Galaxy S26 price rises looming, the data is clear: you should wait before buying the Samsung Galaxy S26.

item.title: Before California, France tried a wealth tax. Macron repealed it after rich people fled the country instead of paying
item.description: A 20-year French experiment with a wealth tax ended with mixed results, but its removal created problems of its own.

item.title: OpenAI CFO Sarah Friar: There’s a ‘mismatch’ between AI’s abilities and the value companies are capturing
item.description: There’s a growing gap between AI's potential and how companies actually use it.

item.title: Where To Find The New ‘Arc Raiders’ Rare And Epic Rubber Ducks
item.description: Here's how to collect all the new Rubber Ducks in Arc Raiders.

item.title: UnitedHealth is reeling from a nearly 20% stock rout after warning investors about its first revenue decline in decades
item.description: "The company expects to return to growth in 2026," UnitedHealth said in May of last year. Today it revealed that it will take a bit longer.

item.title: A Meta deal just turned this 175-year-old company into a linchpin of the AI data center boom
item.description: As hyperscalers race to wire ever-larger AI clusters, Corning is emerging as one of the most critical—and overlooked—suppliers in the stack.

item.title: FDA upgrades cookie recall to highest danger level over undeclared peanuts
item.description: The FDA upgraded the Gregory's Foods cookie dough recall to its most serious risk category over the potential presence of undeclared peanuts.

item.title: Trump says he's 'not a huge fan' of 401(k) withdrawal plan for homebuyers' down payments

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model

item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
